title: Watch now: Fantasy Football Live is back for Week 16
description: Yahoo Sports' fantasy analysts cover the breaking news, important injuries and help managers set their lineups. Use #askFFL on social to interact with the show.
author: Yahoo Sports Videos
excerpt: Yahoo Sports' Fantasy Football Live crew covers the breaking news, important injuries and helps managers set their lineups for Week 16 of the 2024 NFL season...
text:
How will Vanderbilt QB Diego Pavia’s case impact other players?

Yahoo Sports national columnist Dan Wetzel, senior college sports reporter Ross Dellenger and Sports Illustrated’s Pat Forde break down Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia’s winning case against the NCAA and discuss how this could impact junior college players moving forward. Hear the full conversation on the “College Football Enquirer” podcast - and subscribe on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube or wherever you listen.
html: How will Vanderbilt QB Diego Pavia’s case impact other players?<p>Yahoo Sports national columnist Dan Wetzel, senior college sports reporter Ross Dellenger and Sports Illustrated’s Pat Forde break down Vanderbilt quarterback Diego Pavia’s winning case against the NCAA and discuss how this could impact junior college players moving forward. Hear the full conversation on the “College Football Enquirer” podcast - and subscribe on <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/college-football-enquirer/id1423417914">Apple Podcasts</a>, <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://open.spotify.com/show/0x30kB7Vc7T7WAK7ExXzRi">Spotify</a>, <a data-i13n="cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtAg01865jDe9Q4_D6BfY2jgHEix2ZglE">YouTube</a> or <a data-i13n="cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://pod.link/1423417914">wherever you listen.</a></p>
